home.title: Web Application Template
home.description: A modern, secure web application built with SvelteKit and Rust. Features user authentication, protected routes, and a beautiful UI with advanced theming.
home.feature.auth.title: Secure Authentication
home.feature.auth.description: JWT-based authentication with Argon2 password hashing and OAuth support
home.feature.performance.title: High Performance
home.feature.performance.description: Rust backend with SvelteKit frontend for optimal speed and reliability
home.feature.theming.title: Advanced Theming
home.feature.theming.description: Dark/light modes with system preference detection and design tokens
home.feature.types.title: Type Safety
home.feature.types.description: Full TypeScript support with strict type checking and modern tooling
